title: Graves or Kog'maw?
body:
I am looking for a strong champ for any role.  I have 4800 ip and am struggling to choose between graves and kog'maw.  I have tried and thoroughly enjoyed both of them.  Please could you comment below the pros and cons of each of the and who in your opinion is funner as well as strong.

Thanks :)

replies.body: Graves is stupid broken, Kog'maw is OP if you can get to 3 items.
Thanks do you think they'll be nerfed?

Graves will at some point (probably over several patches because i don't think they understand the problem with graves) Kog'maw is fine because his immobile and that is the trade off for the power, however that said one of his core items (Guinsoo's Rageblade) probably needs a nerf, but that has been too strong for way too long.

"tl;dr on what this does: Graves w/o crit does 7-10% less damage w/ autos, Graves w/ crit does sameish damage point blank and more at 425"

It seems as though they are testing some changes to Graves on the PBE currently according to [Surrender@20](http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/current-pbe-balance-changes.html)

> Thanks any other strong 4800's?

There's plenty just need to pick your poison tbh fun factor is huge in this case

Shotgun bob is a good all rounder
Works in jungle or any line

I think Kog will get nerf at some stage to the point where skill are re-adjusted, which might change his mechanic... bob on the other hand, I don't think they can change much, apart from reducing some dmg, so as a long term choice i'd say bob...

Ps:i dont know why I keep on calling graves shotgun bob...
